channel.title: Strong Towns Halifax
channel.description: Recent content in Strong Towns Halifax

item.title: Contact
item.description: By email We will get back to you as soon as possible, do note however that we are a volunteer run organization. strongtownshalifax@gmail.com Social Media We have a social media presence on many platforms, please see the links below. Discord Instagram LinkedIn Twitter

item.title: Get Involved
item.description: There are multiple ways to get involved with Strong Towns Halifax. The best way to get involved now and talk with fellow Strong Towns Halifax members is the discord server. There are also monthly meetups, see events page.

item.title: First Strong Towns Halifax Meeting!
item.description: We just had our first meeting with 12 attendees! The meeting started with a short presentation and was than followed by a meet and greet where we discussed issues, goals, ideas, etc. Stay tuned for our next meeting.

item.title: Build up
item.description: Strong Towns Halifax is a brand new conversation! We are building our online presence, discussing goals, having initial meetings. If you have an idea for a project, you can send it on this form or talk about it with us by getting involved.

item.title: Strong Towns Halifax
item.description: Strong Towns Halifax is a conversation of Strong Towns, it is a hyper local advocacy group. We advocate for strong towns ideas. We are: Community Led Advocates for change If youd like to learn more about strong towns ideas, this playlist from Not Just Bikes is a great resource NJB Strong Towns Playlist

item.title: Strong Towns
item.description: Strong Towns is a movement advocating for financially strong communities through smart urban planning. Emphasizing walkable neighborhoods, cycling infrastructure, and public transit to create sustainable and vibrant cities. Learn More
